author: Samantha Cole, Jason Koebler, Emanuel Maiberg
title: Hentai Site Makes All Porn Free During Coronavirus, Is Immediately Overloaded
description: Fakku announced that it would make its content free to encourage people to stay home.
content:
Fakku, an English-language hentai platform, joined the fight against Covid-19 with an announcement that all of its porn will be free for the next two weeks. 
 Within hours of that announcement, however, the site crashedpossibly due to an overwhelming swarm o… [+1327 chars]
